summary.span: 提供三重数据加密标准 (3DES) 算法的下一代加密技术 (CNG) 实现。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Triple Data Encryption Standard (3DES) algorithm.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.

A symmetric 3DES decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法来创建使用的加密的消息解密重载具有相同签名。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateDecryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[] rgbIV);

Public Overrides Function CreateDecryptor (rgbKey As Byte(), rgbIV As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform
public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateDecryptor(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbKey, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbIV);

param.name: rgbKey

span.span: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm.

param.span: 密钥大小必须为 192 位。

span.span: The key size must be 192 bits.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用于 3DES 算法的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.

summary.span: 用指定的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 创建对称 3DES 解密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric 3DES decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法来创建使用的加密的消息解密重载具有相同签名。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature. > [!NOTE] > 如果已创建对象使用的现有保留的密钥以及你想要使用的密钥解密消息时，要设置属性，然后调用的无参数重载改为; 否则为使用此方法将创建按指定的临时密钥`rgbKey`参数。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when decrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 的大小对于此算法无效。

span.span: is not a valid size for this algorithm.
-or-

exception.span: 的大小与此算法的块大小不匹配。

span.span: size does not match the block size for this algorithm.

exception.span: 是此算法的已知弱密钥，不能使用。

span.span: is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.
-or-
is .

summary.span: 创建 3DES 对称加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a 3DES symmetric encryptor object.

Public Overrides Function CreateEncryptor () As ICryptoTransform
public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateEncryptor();

summary.span: 使用当前键和初始化向量 () 创建对称 3DES 加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector ().
A symmetric 3DES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于加密消息，然后使用重载具有相同的签名来解密此方法的结果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor(unsigned int8[] rgbKey, unsigned int8[] rgbIV) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEncryptor (rgbKey As Byte(), rgbIV As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform

param.name: rgbKey

span.span: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm.

param.span: 密钥大小必须为 192 位。

span.span: The key size must be 192 bits.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用于 3DES 算法的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.

summary.span: 用指定的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 创建对称 3DES 加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric 3DES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于加密消息，然后使用重载具有相同的签名来解密此方法的结果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method. > [!NOTE] > 如果已创建对象使用的现有保留的密钥以及你想要使用的密钥加密消息时，你想要设置属性，然后调用的无参数重载改为; 否则为使用此方法将创建按指定的临时密钥`rgbKey`参数。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when encrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 的大小对于此算法无效。

span.span: is not a valid size for this algorithm.
-or-

exception.span: 的大小与此算法的块大小不匹配。

span.span: size does not match the block size for this algorithm.

exception.span: 是此算法的已知弱密钥，不能使用。

span.span: is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.
-or-
is .

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] Key { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8[] Key
Public Overrides Property Key As Byte()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Key { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 算法的密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets the key for the algorithm.
The key for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已创建对象使用读取的值时的现有保留的密钥，属性，将会进行尝试导出密钥。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key, when you read the value of the property, an attempt to export the key will be made. 在此情况下，如果键不是可导出，将引发。In this case, if the key is not exportable, a will be thrown. 除此之外，如果你设置的值属性，将不再使用保存的密钥，并且将改为使用临时键。In addition to that, if you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead. 如果你需要使用同样，持久化的密钥的新实例类需要创建。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 KeySize
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

value.span: 算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已创建对象使用的现有持久保存密钥，并设置的值属性，将不再使用保存的密钥，并且将改为使用临时键。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead. 如果你需要使用同样，持久化的密钥的新实例类需要创建。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.
